title: Platinum 1 LF Serious Team
body:
I'm an All-rounder - I can play any role the team needs, but in saying that I'm a Jungle Main. 
Looking for a team that is serious and wants to aim high - The OPL.
Add me In-game.

replies.body:
North Esports would love to have you on board! We are a new Esports organisation that aims to make a name for ourselves in the Esports community. If you're interested, hit us up on twitter :P 

https://twitter.com/NorthEsportsNE
